gw.plugin.upgrade

Class IDatamodelUpgrade

  • gw.plugin.upgrade.IDatamodelUpgrade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IDatamodelUpgrade
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Provides details about configurable database upgrade options.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      List<IDatamodelChange<AfterUpgradeVersionTrigger>> AfterUpgradeDatamodelChanges
      A list of version triggers to execute after the automated upgrade. All applicable triggers are executed in the order given.
      List<IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>> BeforeUpgradeDatamodelChanges
      A list of version triggers to execute before the automated upgrade. All applicable triggers are executed in the order given.
      int MajorVersion
      the major version of the datamodel to which this upgrade applies. For customer version triggers, using 0 is fine.

    • Field Detail

      • AfterUpgradeDatamodelChanges

        List<IDatamodelChange<AfterUpgradeVersionTrigger>> AfterUpgradeDatamodelChanges
        A list of version triggers to execute after the automated upgrade. All applicable triggers are executed in the order given.

      • BeforeUpgradeDatamodelChanges

        List<IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>> BeforeUpgradeDatamodelChanges
        A list of version triggers to execute before the automated upgrade. All applicable triggers are executed in the order given.

      • MajorVersion

        int MajorVersion
        the major version of the datamodel to which this upgrade applies. For customer version triggers, using 0 is fine.
